items.summary:

It features a 27-inch Tandem OLED panel and a dual-mode setting that lets you switch resolutions for higher refresh rates when you want smoother gameplay. It also has a unique design that would give your battlestation a fresh look, and you can pre-order your unit to be among the first to grab it. It’s now available to pre-order at Newegg for $1,099.99 shipped, and the retailer’s Pre-Order Guarantee ensures you’ll pay the lowest price if it drops before launch. Head below for more details.

items.title: The new MSI EV Life NEMA 14-50 level 2 chargers come with NACS or J1772 connectors at $425 (Reg. $500)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the new MSI EV Life NEMA 14-50 Level 2 EV Charger with a NACS connector at $424.99 shipped, with its J1772-compatible model also down at $424.99 shipped. These newer charging solutions only hit the market back in August, with them usually going for $500 at full price. The few discounts we’ve seen have dropped costs to $450, $425, and a $400 low back during Black Friday. If you missed out on that low, you can pick up either model at the second-best pricing we have tracked, saving you $75.

items.title: Mammotion’s AI-supported YUKA 2000 robot lawn mower gives you back your time at $1,349 (Reg. $1,799)
items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, Mammotion currently has its YUKA 2000 Robot Lawn Mower down at $1,349 shipped. Normally $1,799 without discounts, this robot has been keeping down at $1,349 since mid-December, with only a single day’s spike up to its full rate before dropping back down. This is a 25% markdown that has cut $450 off the going rate for the second-lowest price we have tracked, only beaten out by the $1,299 low that we last saw during Black Friday and Cyber Monday sales. You can also find three other models from this brand benefitting from up to 35% savings here.
